content: A slave in that situation might still experience frustration, despite being treated well by their master. Their situation as a slave, no matter how kind the master, is still a denial of their freedom and individuality. There may also be moments or specific issues that cause frustration, such as being unable to freely pursue their cultural or personal interests, or being unable to control the events and circumstances of their life. Additionally, while they may be grateful for the kindness of their master, they might still feel a sense of anger and frustration towards the larger system of slavery and their own inability to escape it.
